content.text: Hello! What's up?
Not much. Just got home from a long day at work. You?
Same here. Just got home from work too. I'm a vet tech at an animal clinic.
Oh cool! What's your favorite part about the job?
I love working with animals. They're so cute and cuddly.
Me too! I have a cat named Mittens. He's my best friend.
Aww, I love cats! I have a cat named Snowball.
That's a cute name. Do you have any other pets?
No, just Snowball. I'm not really a dog person.
Me neither. I'm more of a cat person.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, go to the mountains, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to play video games, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends too.
Oh, I like video games too! What's your favorite game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Skyrim.
Oh, I've heard good things about that game. I've never played it before.
You should! It's a really fun game.
I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Okay, I will.
